    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    ControlPanel
    The ControlPanel class represents the GUI component containing editor controls.
    Editable
    The Editable interface defines the basic text editing capabilities.
    Editor
    The abstract Editor class serves as the base class for all editor implementations.
    EditorApp
    The entry point for the text editor application.
    EditorException
    The EditorException class is a base exception class for all editor-related exceptions.
    EditorFactory
    The abstract EditorFactory class defines a factory method for creating editors.
    EditorGUI
    The EditorGUI class represents the main graphical user interface for the text editor application.
    EditorManager
    The EditorManager class manages editor instances and handles editor-specific operations.
    EditorPanel
    The EditorPanel class represents the GUI component displaying the editor content.
    EditorSerializer
    The EditorSerializer class provides static methods for saving and loading editor instances.
    InvalidWordException
    The InvalidWordException is thrown when an operation involves an invalid or unrecognized word.
    SpellCheckEditor
    The SpellCheckEditor extends the base Editor class to provide spell checking capabilities.
    SpellCheckEditorFactory
    The SpellCheckEditorFactory creates SpellCheckEditor instances.
    StatusPanel
    The StatusPanel class represents the GUI component displaying status information.
    Transformable
    The Transformable interface extends the Editable interface with transformation capabilities.
    TranslateEditor
    The TranslateEditor extends the base Editor class to provide text translation functionality.
    TranslateEditorFactory
    The TranslateEditorFactory creates TranslateEditor instances.
    WordPredictor
    The WordPredictor class provides word prediction functionality based on a vocabulary.
